name: Boveda for Cigars/Tobacco | 65% RH 2-Way Humidity Control | Size 8 for Use with Up to 5 Cigars | Patented Technology For Cigar Humidors | 10-Count Resealable Bag
description:
RESTORE AND MAINTAIN cigars with the global leader in 2-way humidity control. Place Boveda in your humidor for precise Relative Humidity (RH), so they’re ready for that perfect moment—the smoke. Choose among 4 RH (65%, 69%, 72% and 75%)


ORDER 65% RH Boveda for Cuban, Dominican, Puro or drier cigars or if humidor is in a humid climate. (Depending on personal preference, also appropriate for up to 1 oz English, flakes and other non-flavored pipe tobacco)


HOW MANY BOVEDA FOR YOUR HUMIDOR? Use one (1) Size 8 Boveda for up to 5 TOTAL cigars a travel humidor can hold. Example: For a 12-cigar capacity humidor, use three (3) Size 8 Boveda at once. For bigger humidors, use Size 60 Boveda


NOTHING TO ADD OR ACTIVATE—Automatically adds AND absorbs moisture to keep your premium cigars fresh and tasting the way cigar makers intended


LONG LASTING—Maintains the right RH for 2-4 months in a travel humidor. A simple touch test will let you know when it’s time to replace Boveda—it will feel rigid and crunchy

description:
Also known as Riverside Wormwood, Felon Herb, Chrysanthemum Weed, Wild Wormwood, Old Uncle Henry, Sailor's Tobacco, Naughty Man, Old Man Or St. John's Plant


The shrub was also used by ancient Europeans and Asians in treating various ailments.


The mugwort has a large number of uses, and has been traditionally used to treat digestive disorders, and it has also been used as a tonic for various remedies.


The mugwort is known to be milder in action than most other species of Artemisia, and this means that it can be taken for improving appetite, digestive functions, and absorption of nutrients over long periods of time, in small doses.


Ingredients: 100% Mugwort (Artemisia vulgaris) - Net Weight: 1.23oz / 35g

description:
RESTORE AND MAINTAIN flower with the global leader in 2-way humidity control. Place Boveda in packaging and/or storage for precise Relative Humidity (RH) to protect all the good stuff (terpenes, cannabinoids and flavonoids)


CHOOSE 58% OR 62% RH—a personal preference depending on how you prefer your experience or on what the humidity level is where you are. Some prefer 58% RH for personal-use products or 62% for larger herbal storage


ALL-NATURAL SALTS AND PURE WATER inside keep flower fresh for 2-4 MONTHS in airtight containers. Just place in container with up to 1 lb (450 g). Replace when Boveda is rigid


PRESERVES “SMELL” that’s released after the grind. Boveda creates a monolayer of purified water molecules that naturally coats trichomes to shield terpenes and cannabinoids preserving the smell until use

name: Cigarette Lighter Adapter, OOWOLF 3-Socket 180W 12V/24V DC Quick Charge 3.0 Power Car Splitter for GPS, Dash Cam, Sat Nav, Phone, iPad, Tablet (Black-Red)
category:

                Cell Phones & Accessories
            
                Accessories
            
                Chargers
            
                 Automobile Chargers
description:
【3 Sockets / 180W Power Supply】 - 3 sockets have been added so that different equipment can be used at the same time. The power supply is up to 180W, and single socket power is not exceed 100W. This cigarette lighter adapter can supply power to multiple devices such as portable navigation systems, drive recorders, in-vehicle surveillance cameras, smart phones, tablets, car cleaners and in-vehicle refrigerators, etc.


【2 Extra Fuse & Smart IC Inside】 - Double protection. One fuse was built in the cigar socket. What's more, this cigarette lighter adapter comes with two replacement fuses, which can be replaced if broken. The cigarette lighter splitter is equipped with a smart IC that adjusts the output appropriately according to the equipment. It has complete protection circuits, prevent the car power splitter and your devices from overheating, overloading or short-circuiting.


【4 USB Charging Ports & QC3.0】- 3 cigar sockets are equipped with 3 USB2.0 ports (3.6A * 3) 1 QC3.0 charging port. This cigarette lighter adapter can fast charge multiple devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac, Android, Google, Huawei, etc) simultaneously, which solved the problem of lack of cigar usb socket.


【LED Voltage Display & For 12-24V Vehicles】 - Once the vehicle power center is on and turning on the main switch, the LED display will monitor your car battery automatically. With an LED display for automatic voltage measurement, you can check the vehicle voltage at any time. When the voltage falls below 10.5V, it will stop automatically. The cigarette lighter adapter can be used for a wide range of vehicles such as trucks and campers, as well as ordinary vehicles.


【Independent Switch & Package Contents】 - This 3-sockets cigarette lighter adapter has one main switch for whole car charger adapter and the independent on/off switch for each socket, which can avoid to insert and pull out the plug frequently, save energy and reduce the wear and tear and expanding lifespan of your appliances in your car. Package Included: Cigarette lighter adapter * 1 / Fuse * 2 / 3M tape * 2 / Magic tape * 1 / Instruction manual * 1.

name: Boveda for Cigars/Tobacco | 72% RH 2-Way Humidity Control | Size 60 for Use with Every 25 Cigars a Humidor Can Hold | Patented Technology For Cigar Humidors | 12-Count Retail Carton
description:
RESTORE AND MAINTAIN cigars with the global leader in 2-way humidity control. Place Boveda in your humidor for precise Relative Humidity (RH) so they’re ready for that perfect moment—the smoke. Choose among 4 RH (65%, 69%, 72% and 75%)


ORDER 72% RH to OVER compensate for leaky or glass top humidor or humidor in a dry climate. Regulates moisture lost to achieve 69% RH. (Depending on personal preference, also appropriate for up to 1 lb aromatic pipe tobacco)


HOW MANY BOVEDA FOR YOUR HUMIDOR? Use one (1) Size 60 Boveda for every 25 TOTAL cigars a humidor can hold. Example: For a 100-cigar capacity humidor, use four (4) Size 60 Boveda at once. For bigger humidors, use Size 320 Boveda


NOTHING TO ADD OR ACTIVATE—Eliminates the mess of using water, gels, beads or PG (Propylene Glycol) in your humidor. Automatically adds AND absorbs moisture to keep your premium cigars fresh and tasting the way cigar makers intended


LONG LASTING—Maintains the right RH for a wood humidor for 2-4 months and an airtight humidor for 6-9 months. A simple touch test will let you know when it’s time to replace Boveda—it will feel rigid and crunchy

name: Boveda for Cigars/Tobacco | 75% RH 2-Way Humidity Control | Size 60 for Use with Every 25 Cigars a Humidor Can Hold | Patented Technology For Cigar Humidors | 4-Count Resealable Bag
description:
RESTORE AND MAINTAIN cigars with the global leader in 2-way humidity control. Place Boveda in your humidor for precise Relative Humidity (RH) so they’re ready for that perfect moment—the smoke. Choose among 4 RH (65%, 69%, 72% and 75%)


ORDER 75% RH for most wood humidors and cigars with fragile wrappers. (Depending on your personal preference, also appropriate for up to 1 lb aromatic pipe tobacco)


HOW MANY BOVEDA FOR YOUR HUMIDOR? Use one (1) Size 60 Boveda for every 25 TOTAL cigars a humidor can hold. Example: For a 100-cigar capacity humidor, use four (4) Size 60 Boveda at once. For bigger humidors, use Size 320 Boveda


NOTHING TO ADD OR ACTIVATE—Eliminates the mess of using water, gels, beads or PG (Propylene Glycol) in your humidor. Automatically adds AND absorbs moisture to keep your premium cigars fresh and tasting the way cigar makers intended


LONG LASTING—Maintains the right RH for a wood humidor for 2-4 months and an airtight humidor for 6-9 months. A simple touch test will let you know when it’s time to replace this humidity control—the Boveda will feel rigid and crunchy

description:
CREATE THE IDEAL WOOD HUMIDOR with the global leader in 2-way humidity control—The mess-free way to condition a wood humidor before you add cigars and Boveda patented humidity control to restore and/or maintain premium cigars to a precise Relative Humidity (RH)


WHY SEASON—Boveda provides moisture directly to the cellular structure of a wood humidor to create a better seal and prevent the wood from stealing moisture from your premium cigars


SEASON EASILY—Just place the Boveda 84% RH in an EMPTY humidor for two (2) weeks. Toss Boveda Seasoning away when you’re done (Boveda isn’t reusable) and replace with desired Boveda RH


USE THE RIGHT AMOUNT—Use one (1) Size 60 Boveda for every 25 TOTAL cigars a humidor can hold. Example: For a 100-cigar capacity humidor, use four (4) Size 60 Boveda at once. Seasoning a smaller humidor? Use fewer Boveda


RESEALABLE high-barrier plastic bag is factory sealed. Keep the zipper closed and you can expect these unwrapped Boveda to stay fresh for up to 2 years before you're ready to put them to use

name: Boveda for Cigars/Tobacco | 65% RH 2-Way Humidity Control | Size 60 for Use with Every 25 Cigars a Humidor Can Hold | Patented Technology For Cigar Humidors | 20-Count Reclosable Bag
description:
RESTORE AND MAINTAIN cigars with the global leader in 2-way humidity control. Place Boveda in your humidor for precise Relative Humidity (RH) so they’re ready for that perfect moment—the smoke. Choose among 4 RH (65%, 69%, 72% and 75%)


ORDER 65% RH for wood humidor with tight seal or airtight acrylic humidor. (Depending on personal preference, also appropriate for up to 1 lb English, flakes and other non-flavored pipe tobacco)


HOW MANY BOVEDA FOR YOUR HUMIDOR? Use one (1) Size 60 Boveda for every 25 TOTAL cigars a humidor can hold. Example: For a 100-cigar capacity humidor, use four (4) Size 60 Boveda at once. For bigger humidors, use Size 320 Boveda


NOTHING TO ADD OR ACTIVATE—Eliminates the mess of using water, gels, beads or PG (Propylene Glycol) in your humidor. Automatically adds AND absorbs moisture to keep your premium cigars fresh and tasting the way cigar makers intended


LONG LASTING—Maintains the right RH for a wood humidor for 2-4 months and an airtight humidor for 6-9 months. A simple touch test will let you know when it’s time to replace this humidity control—the Boveda will feel rigid and crunchy

description:
LARGER OCTODOR - This is our biggest humidor yet, holding up to 100 cigars (depending on cigar type). We've kept all of the coveted Case Elegance humidor features like the front digital hygrometer, magnetic lid, and accessory drawer. The Octodor was meticulously crafted into a unique octagon shape and comes with an elegant high-gloss black piano finish.


RECESSED HUMIDIFICATION SYSTEM - The Octodor comes packaged with the patent-pending Hydro System; an accurate and low maintenance cigar humidification system. Unlike other models we have specially built this humidor to recess the system so 0 space is taken up, allowing you to store more of your smokes. The Hydro System keeps your CE humidor perfectly seasoned between 65% to 70% RH. We recommend purchasing CE Humidor Solution for best taste and longevity.


SPANISH CEDAR - We've incorporated real Spanish cedar making this humidor a moisture-holding machine.


DIGITAL HYGROMETER - A staple of CE humidors is the built-in digital hygrometer. This is the most accurate way to monitor and ensure your humidor is adequately seasoned. The space grey metal cover was custom molded to match the octagon shape of the humidor.


ACCESSORY STORAGE - Properly store your lighter, cigar cutters, and travel case in the large bottom slide-out accessory storage drawer. The drawer is lined with a plush felt and fitted with a custom octagon shaped handle making it easier to get to your accessories. (CE Accessories Not Included).

name: Boveda for Cigars/Tobacco | 65% RH 2-Way Humidity Control | Size 8 for Use with Up to 5 Cigars | Patented Technology For Cigar Humidors | 10-Count Resealable Bag
description:
RESTORE AND MAINTAIN cigars with the global leader in 2-way humidity control. Place Boveda in your humidor for precise Relative Humidity (RH), so they’re ready for that perfect moment—the smoke. Choose among 4 RH (65%, 69%, 72% and 75%)


ORDER 65% RH Boveda for Cuban, Dominican, Puro or drier cigars or if humidor is in a humid climate. (Depending on personal preference, also appropriate for up to 1 oz English, flakes and other non-flavored pipe tobacco)


HOW MANY BOVEDA FOR YOUR HUMIDOR? Use one (1) Size 8 Boveda for up to 5 TOTAL cigars a travel humidor can hold. Example: For a 12-cigar capacity humidor, use three (3) Size 8 Boveda at once. For bigger humidors, use Size 60 Boveda


NOTHING TO ADD OR ACTIVATE—Automatically adds AND absorbs moisture to keep your premium cigars fresh and tasting the way cigar makers intended


LONG LASTING—Maintains the right RH for 2-4 months in a travel humidor. A simple touch test will let you know when it’s time to replace Boveda—it will feel rigid and crunchy

description:
Also known as Riverside Wormwood, Felon Herb, Chrysanthemum Weed, Wild Wormwood, Old Uncle Henry, Sailor's Tobacco, Naughty Man, Old Man Or St. John's Plant


The shrub was also used by ancient Europeans and Asians in treating various ailments.


The mugwort has a large number of uses, and has been traditionally used to treat digestive disorders, and it has also been used as a tonic for various remedies.


The mugwort is known to be milder in action than most other species of Artemisia, and this means that it can be taken for improving appetite, digestive functions, and absorption of nutrients over long periods of time, in small doses.


Ingredients: 100% Mugwort (Artemisia vulgaris) - Net Weight: 1.23oz / 35g

description:
RESTORE AND MAINTAIN cigars with the global leader in 2-way humidity control. Place Boveda in your humidor for precise Relative Humidity (RH) so they’re ready for that perfect moment—the smoke. Choose among 4 RH (65%, 69%, 72% and 75%)


ORDER 72% RH to OVER compensate for leaky or glass top humidor or humidor in a dry climate. Regulates moisture lost to achieve 69% RH. (Depending on personal preference, also appropriate for up to 1 lb aromatic pipe tobacco)


HOW MANY BOVEDA FOR YOUR HUMIDOR? Use one (1) Size 60 Boveda for every 25 TOTAL cigars a humidor can hold. Example: For a 100-cigar capacity humidor, use four (4) Size 60 Boveda at once. For bigger humidors, use Size 320 Boveda


NOTHING TO ADD OR ACTIVATE—Eliminates the mess of using water, gels, beads or PG (Propylene Glycol) in your humidor. Automatically adds AND absorbs moisture to keep your premium cigars fresh and tasting the way cigar makers intended


LONG LASTING—Maintains the right RH for a wood humidor for 2-4 months and an airtight humidor for 6-9 months. A simple touch test will let you know when it’s time to replace this humidity control—the Boveda will feel rigid and crunchy
